name: TeronTest1
description:
Исходник http://userstyles.org/styles/33514
Меняет местами расположение кнопок рейтинга + и - .
Реклама не блокируется.

Stylesheet for teron.ru by sergey-it.lj.ru (ex chtec-059) 26.05.2015 - The Best Skin, change reputation buttons +-
css: @-moz-document domain("teron.ru") { #branding { min-height: 93px !important; } .topAnner { padding-top: 0px !important; } #user_navigation { top: 80px !important; left: 15px !important; margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; } #user_navigation.not_logged_in { top: 102px !important; left: 5px !important; } #user_navigation.not_logged_in a { padding: 2px 10px 2px 10px !important; } #user_navigation .photo { margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px !important; border-width: 0px !important; } #jama { top: 94px !important; } #user_info { margin: 14px 15px 0px 75px !important; } #primary_nav { background-position: -2px !important; height: 36px !important; } #search { margin: 2px 0px 0px 0px !important; } #secondary_nav { padding: 10px 15px 20px 15px !important; } #stat_links { margin-top: 10px !important; } .filter_bar { margin-bottom: 0px !important; } .statistics { padding: 5px !important; } #stats, #forum_legend { padding-left: 5px !important; width: 30% !important; } body .stats_list { width: 68% !important; margin-bottom: 0px !important; } .stats_list ul, .stats_list p { margin-left: 0px !important; } #footer_utilities { margin-top: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; } #board_footer { margin: 10px 15px 0px 15px !important; padding: 6px 8px 15px 8px !important; } #c_in { margin: 10px 15px 20px 15px !important; } #counters td.cmenu, #counters #count_menu { padding-left: 5px !important; } ul.pagination li.next a, ul.pagination li.prev a { padding: 1px 16px 1px 16px !important; } table.ipb_table tr td { padding: 3px 5px 3px 5px !important; } body table.ipb_table tr td p { font-size: 0.85em !important; } table.ipb_table ol.subforums { padding-top: 0px !important; } #content .message { padding: 2px 5px 2px 30px !important; background-position: 5px 0px !important; line-height: 100% !important; } table.ipb_table tr.subhead th { padding: 2px 8px 2px 8px !important; } .topic_buttons li a, .topic_buttons li span { padding: 2px 10px 2px 5px !important; } .header, .post_block h3, .general_box h3 { background: #a9d29c url(http://chtec-059.narod.ru/teron-gr-top2.gif) repeat-x top !important; } ul.post_controls { background: #a9d29c url(http://chtec-059.narod.ru/teron-gr-bottom2.gif) repeat-x bottom !important; } .post_wrap { border: 1px solid #a9d29c !important; } span.post_id { padding-top: 0px !important; } .author { padding-right: 16px !important; } span.post_id a, .author_info, .author_info ul.user_fields li, p.edit, .signature { color: #8e8e8e !important; font-size: 11px !important; } .author_info { margin: 0px !important; width: 200px !important; } .author_info .user_controls { margin: 2px 0px 2px 0px !important; } .warn_panel { padding: 0px 0px 2px 0px !important; } .post_body { margin: 0px 10px 0px 220px !important; } p.posted_info { margin: 0px !important; padding: 5px 0px 5px 0px !important; } .tab_general .post_body, #tab_posts .post_body, #tab_topics .post_body { margin: 0px !important; padding: 5px 10px 5px 10px !important; } .tab_general p.posted_info, #tab_posts p.posted_info, #tab_topics p.posted_info { margin: 0px !important; padding: 5px 10px 5px 10px !important; } .post_body .post { margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; } p.citation { padding: 0px 5px 0px 5px !important; line-height: 120% !important; } div.quote { padding: 5px !important; } .post_body table { width: 100% !important; } p.edit, .signature { margin: 10px 0px 0px 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; line-height: 120% !important; } .rep_bar { bottom: 4px !important; background: none !important; } .rep_bar ul { margin-top: 0px !important; } .reputation { padding: 2px 6px 2px 6px !important; } .post_wrap ul.post_controls { padding: 2px 70px 20px 5px !important; } ul.post_controls { padding: 2px 5px 20px 5px !important; } .general_box { border-bottom-width: 1px !important; } ul.post_controls li, ul.post_controls a { background-image: none !important; margin: 0px 5px 0px 0px !important; } ul.post_controls a { padding: 2px !important; } ul.post_controls li.report, ul.post_controls li.top, ul.post_controls.left li { float: right !important; } ul.post_controls li.selected { background-color: #0b8c0c !important; } .post a { color: #0b8c0c !important; } .general_box h3 { padding: 3px 5px 3px 5px !important; } a.rep_up { left: 45px; position: relative; } a.rep_down { left: -45px; position: relative; } }
